subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Deron Williams, who had come off the bench in his previous six games, had 13 points and 6 assists, but the Nets were edged by the Pacers for their third straight loss.
snippet: Deron Williams, who had come off the bench in his previous six games, had 13 points and 6 assists, but the Nets were edged by the Pacers for their third straight loss.
